burnses1.description: The Burns sisters came for a sleepover.  Everybody had a fantastic time.  The costume box was pillaged repeatedly. Here Torin is wearing the Superman cape as a skirt. Felix is wearing his brand new all-pink outfit (except for his pink socks). Kora is wearing the princess costume and Felix's new socks.
burnses1.title: Burnses 1

burnses2.description: Would you like one marshmallow or two?
burnses2.title: Burnses 2

burnses3.description: Kora and Felix are playing doctor, or so they say.
burnses3.title: Burnses 3

burnses5.description: Felix is a dog and Nurse Torin is carrying some sort of beach ball medical equipment.
burnses5.title: Burnses 5

burnses6.description:
The big kids excluded Milo from many of their games and he was crushed. Especially because he's used to getting lots of love from the Burns sisters. He had a couple of tear-soaked tantrums.

Princess Kora, though, took a break from her royal duties to console Milo. He very much appreciated it.
burnses6.title: Burnses 6

godfather1.description: Enough playing with the ladies!  Felix unleashes his inner boy in a good ol' wrestling session with Austin.
godfather1.title: Godfather 1

jorah1.description: This is Jorah and mom Suzanne. Jorah and Milo have been sharing a nanny, Lucy, on Thursdays for about 3 months. The families got together for a pancake brunch.
jorah1.title: Jorah 1

jorah2.description: Jorah's six months older, a lifetime at that age.  He can really talk and he's always asking questions.  He's obsessed with trains, same as Felix was.
jorah2.title: Jorah 2

jorah3.description: Jorah approved of Milo's toy and book selections.
jorah3.title: Jorah 3

sideburns.description: Milo is fascinated by band-aids, which he calls boo-boos.
sideburns.title: Sideburns

description:
We had a very social weekend. The sleepovers, play dates, brunches and lunches were a welcome change from the ealier part of the week, when both Felix and Lucie were knocked out with strep throat.

Milo can finally say "Felix"! It comes out "fay-eeck" but what's important is that Felix understands it. Felix has been noticably more interactive with Milo because of it. Milo can also say Maria ("ria"), which makes Maria very happy.

Milo's teething. One incisor broke the gum, and the others are right behind. When the Tylenol wears out, he gets cranky. We keep an ample supply of Tylenol on hand.
title: February 19
